templates.title: OpenClaw
templates.name: openclaw
templates.description: OpenClaw is a self-hosted AI agent platform that provides Claude AI integration through a local gateway. It enables running AI assistants with local tool execution, file access, and workspace management. Features include WebSocket gateway, browser automation, and extensible command framework.
templates.note: Self-hosted AI agent platform with Claude integration

env.name: OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN
env.label: OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN
env.description: Gateway authentication token (required). Generate using: openssl rand -hex 32

env.name: CLAUDE_AI_SESSION_KEY
env.label: CLAUDE_AI_SESSION_KEY
env.description: Claude AI session key for API access (optional)
